title: The Stand - Book I: Captain Trips
itunes:title: The Stand - Book I: Captain Trips
itunes:subtitle: The Losers start walking through Stephen King’s The Stand with the novel's first of three books: "Captain Trips". Chapters include: Remastered Intro, Losers Intro (04:05), History (17:56), The Hook (31:00), Structure & Fo...
description:
The Losers start walking through Stephen King’s The Stand with the novel's first of three books: "Captain Trips". 


Chapters include: Remastered Intro, Losers Intro (04:05), History (17:56), The Hook (31:00), Structure & Format (55:50), Heroes and Villains (1:36:00), Sematary (2:35:00), Poundcake! (2:51:35), King’s Dominion (3:12:20), Final Thoughts (3:23:00), and Outro (3:34:00)


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
